# Mobile UX Screenshots

This directory contains screenshots generated by the mobile UX analysis test.

Screenshots are captured at 375x667px (iPhone SE viewport) to identify mobile UX issues.

## Usage

```bash
# Run the screenshot test
cd apps/web
pnpm test:e2e tests/e2e/mobile-ux-screenshots.spec.ts

# Or with UI mode for debugging
pnpm test:e2e:ui tests/e2e/mobile-ux-screenshots.spec.ts
```

## Generated Files

- `mobile-teacher-dashboard.png` - Teacher dashboard
- `mobile-teacher-classrooms.png` - Classrooms list
- `mobile-teacher-classroom-detail.png` - Individual classroom
- `mobile-teacher-tests-library.png` - Content Library
- `mobile-teacher-test-wizard-step1.png` - Test creation wizard
- `mobile-teacher-students.png` - Students list  
- `mobile-teacher-student-detail.png` - Student detail page
- `mobile-student-dashboard.png` - Student dashboard
- `mobile-student-results.png` - Student results
- `mobile-auth-login.png` - Login page
- `mobile-auth-register.png` - Register page

## Analysis Checklist

When reviewing screenshots, look for:

- [ ] Button overflow or crowding
- [ ] Text too small to read (< 14px)
- [ ] Touch targets < 44px
- [ ] Excessive scrolling required
- [ ] Tables that don't fit
- [ ] Forms with poor mobile layout
- [ ] Navigation issues
- [ ] Content cutoff or clipping
